name: Newtech Filter
short_description:
this is a proof of concept direct show filter implementing the tntdemux algorithm. Based on MDAPI filter (http://sourceforge.net/projects/mdapifilter) , this filter will allow to get picture on newtec transponders found on ab3 sat. 
The newtec transponders are not encryted and the transport stream is just muxed in a different way than standard DVB-S.

This filter is not yet functional, the filter and the associated gui program has been tested using a WinTV-HVR-4000, but other user reported that it was not working. This is because the intended Audience are Developers.
